name: Inchworm
target: Full Body, Upper Body, Core, Lower Body
target_muscles: Shoulders, Chest, Biceps, Forearms, Back, Abs, Lower Back, Glutes, Hamstrings, Quadriceps, Calves
instruction: Stand straight with your feet shoulder-width apart. Bend over and touch the floor with the palms of your hands. Walk your hands out, as far as you can while keeping your legs straight, and pause. Walk back up to the starting position and repeat until the set is complete.
hints: Keep your legs straight, don't let your hips sag, and maintain a neutral spine. Engage your core muscles to stabilize the movement and walk your hands out as far as you can without losing form. Breathe deeply and lift the heels as you walk out, keeping the toes in the same spot.
